TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A disorder caused by the presence of an extra chromosome 21 and characterized by mental retardation and distinguishing physical features.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "síndrome de Down"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Trastorno causado por la presencia de un cromosoma 21 extra y caracterizado por el retraso mental y características físicas distintivas.
